name: Traitor
tagline: When straight arrow FBI agent Roy Clayton heads up the investigation into a dangerous international conspiracy, all clues seem to lead back to former U.S. Special Operations officer, Samir Horn.

name: Heist
tagline: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

name: Hotel Rwanda

production.name: Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa

tagline: The true story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.

name: Hoodlum
tagline: Black gangsters in 1930 Harlem fights Dutch Schultz who is trying to horn in on their numbers racket.

name: Eight Crazy Nights
tagline: Davey Stone, an alcoholic with a criminal record, is sentenced to community service under the supervision of an elderly referee. Davey is then faced with trying to reform and abandon his bad habits.

name: Endless Love
tagline: The story of a privileged girl and a charismatic boy whose instant desire sparks a love affair made only more reckless by parents trying to keep them apart.

name: Leap of Faith
tagline: Fake faith healer Jonas Nightingale is stranded in a small town where he finds he can't fool all of the people all of the time.

name: Reindeer Games
tagline: After assuming his dead cellmate's identity to get with his girlfriend, an ex-con finds himself the reluctant participant in a casino heist.

name: From Paris with Love
tagline: In Paris, a young employee in the office of the US Ambassador hooks up with an American spy looking to stop a terrorist attack in the city.

name: The Avengers
tagline: Two British agents (John Steed and Emma Peel) team up to stop Sir August De Wynter from destroying the world with a weather changing machine.

name: The Covenant
tagline: Four young men who belong to a supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Another great force they must contend with is the jealousy and suspicion that threatens to tear them apart.

name: The Usual Suspects
tagline: A boat has been destroyed, criminals are dead, and the key to this mystery lies with the only survivor and his twisted, convoluted story beginning with five career crooks in a seemingly random police lineup.

name: Kingdom Come
tagline: A group of old family members bands together when a despicable family member thankfully expires.

name: Faster
tagline: An ex-con sets out to avenge his brother's death after they were double-crossed during a heist years ago. During his campaign, however, he's tracked by a veteran cop and an egocentric hit man.

name: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London
tagline: With all-new gadgets, high-flying action, exciting chases and a wisecracking new handler, Derek (Anthony Anderson), Cody has to retrieve the device before the world's leaders fall under the evil control of a diabolical villain.

name: Pompeii
tagline: A slave-turned-gladiator finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, who has been betrothed to a corrupt Roman Senator. As Mount Vesuvius erupts, he must fight to save his beloved as Pompeii crumbles around him.

name: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
tagline: Two girlfriends on a summer holiday in Spain become enamored with the same painter, unaware that his ex-wife, with whom he has a tempestuous relationship, is about to re-enter the picture.

name: One True Thing
tagline: A career woman reassesses her parents' lives after she is forced to care for her cancer-stricken mother.

name: Benny & Joon
tagline: A mentally ill young woman finds her love in an eccentric man who models himself after Buster Keaton.

name: Monte Carlo
tagline: Three young women vacationing in Paris find themselves whisked away to Monte Carlo after one of the girls is mistaken for a British heiress.

name: The Iron Giant
tagline: A boy makes friends with an innocent alien giant robot that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

name: Match Point
tagline: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for a femme-fatal type who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

name: Stay Alive
tagline: For a group of teens, the answer to the mysterious death of their old friend lies within the world of an online video game based on the true story of an ancient noblewoman known as the Blood Countess.

name: Piglet's Big Movie
tagline: When Piglet comes up missing his Hundred Acre Wood friends use Piglet's own Book of Memories to find him, discovering along the way just how big a role he's played in their lives.

name: Sanctum
tagline: An underwater cave diving team experiences a life-threatening crisis during an expedition to the unexplored and least accessible cave system in the world.

name: Fighting
tagline: In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.

name: The Players Club
tagline: A woman must contend with rival strippers and her boss in an attempt to make a legitimate living.

name: Bulletproof Monk
tagline: Based on the very underground comic book, a Tibetan monk becomes a mentor to a young street kid whom he can teach to protect a scroll.

name: The Program
tagline: Several players from different backgrounds try to cope with the pressures of playing football at a major university. Each deals with the pressure differently, some turn to drinking, others to drugs, and some to studying.

name: The Russia House
tagline: An expatriate British publisher unexpectedly finds himself working for British intelligence to investigate people in Russia.

name: The Remains of the Day
tagline: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years post World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty has been.

name: D3: The Mighty Ducks
tagline: In the third episode of this series, the Ducks get scholarships to Eden Hall Academy, a high ranking prep school. But as freshmen, they will have to face the snob varsity team...

name: The Care Bears Movie
tagline: The Care Bears watch over a young brother and sister who have lost their trust in humanity. Meanwhile an evil wizard wishes to cover the Earth in concrete.

name: Love Happens
tagline: A widower whose book about coping with loss turns him into a best-selling self-help guru, falls for the hotel florist where his seminar is given, only to learn that he hasn't yet truly confronted his wife's passing.

name: Ella Enchanted
tagline: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new step-family in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.

name: Rounders
tagline: A young man is a reformed gambler who must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks.

name: Guilty as Sin
tagline: A female lawyer takes an accused wife-murderer as a client, but finds herself morally compelled to betray him one way or another.

name: Revolutionary Road
tagline: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children. Based on a novel by Richard Yates.

name: Two for the Money
tagline: After suffering a career-ending injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.

name: Being John Malkovich
tagline: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of the movie star, John Malkovich.

name: Raising Arizona
tagline: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintupelets, their lives get more complicated than they anticipated.

name: Beloved
tagline: Based on the book by Toni Morrison, in which a slave is visited by the spirit of her deceased daughter.

name: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
tagline: James Bond woos a mob boss's daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps that involves beautiful women from around the world.

name: Frankie and Johnny
tagline: Johnny has just been released from prison, and gets a job in a café beside waitress Frankie. Frankie is a bit of a loner, but Johnny is determined their romance will blossom.

name: Joe Somebody
tagline: When Joe is beat up by a co-worker in front of his daughter on "Bring Your Child To Work Day", he decides to fight back.

name: Titan A.E.
tagline: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

name: Rudy
tagline: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

name: Dickie Roberts: Former Child Star
tagline: A thirty-something former child star hires a foster family to re-create the childhood he never had.

name: Prime
tagline: A career driven professional from Manhattan is wooed by a young painter, who also happens to be the son of her psychoanalyst.

name: Quest for Camelot
tagline: An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit and a goofy two headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.

name: Thunderheart
tagline: A young mixed-blood FBI agent is assigned to work with a cynical veteran investigator on a murder on a poverty-stricken Sioux reservation.

name: My Tutor
tagline: A rich father hires a tutor for his son. The son is a horny teenager and the tutor is a gorgeous blonde. Complications ensue.

name: Much Ado About Nothing
tagline: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

name: Babylon A.D.
tagline: Veteran-turned-mercenary Toorop takes the high-risk job of escorting a woman from Russia to America. Little does he know that she is host to an organism that a cult wants to harvest in order to produce a genetically modified Messiah.

name: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
tagline: When a regular guy dumps a superhero of her neediness, she uses her powers to make his life a living hell.

name: The Incredible Burt Wonderstone
tagline: When a street magician's stunts begins to make their show look stale, superstar magicians Burt Wonderstone and Anton Marvelton look to salvage on their act - and their friendship - by staging their own daring stunt.

name: The Black Dahlia
tagline: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" murder investigation.

name: Lucky Number Slevin
tagline: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss. Slevin is under constant surveillance by relentless Detective Brikowski as well as the infamous assassin Goodkat and finds himself having to hatch his own ingenious plot to get them before they get him.

name: War
tagline: An FBI Agent seeks vengeance on a mysterious assassin known as "Rogue" who murdered his partner.

name: Fame
tagline: An updated version of the 1980 musical, which centered on the students of the New York Academy of Performing Arts.

name: Magnolia
tagline: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

name: In Search of Historic Jesus
tagline: This examination of historical sources speculates on the accuracy of the biblical depiction of Jesus.

name: City by the Sea
tagline: Vincent Lamarca, whose father was executed for a 1950s kidnapping of a child, grew up to become a police officer, only to see his own son become a murderer.

name: License to Drive
tagline: A teen decides to go for a night on the town with his friends despite flunking his driver's test.

name: Red Corner
tagline: An American attorney on business in China, ends up wrongfully on trial for murder and his only key to innocence is a female defense lawyer from the country.

name: The Alamo
tagline: Based on the 1836 standoff between a group of Texan and Tejano men, led by Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie, and Mexican dictator Santa Anna's forces at the Alamo in San Antonio, Texas.

name: Edtv
tagline: Video store clerk Ed agrees to have his life filmed by a camera crew for a tv network.

name: The Borrowers
tagline: A secret family of four-inch people living inside the walls of a house must save their home from an evil real estate developer.

name: Blue Chips
tagline: A college basketball coach is forced to break the rules in order to get the players he needs to stay competitive.

name: At First Sight
tagline: A blind man has an operation to regain his sight at the urging of his girlfriend and must deal with the changes to his life.

name: My Fellow Americans
tagline: Two former U. S. Presidents, hated rivals, join forces to expose the current, corrupt President at the risk of their lives.

name: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
tagline: Deuce is tricked again into man-whoring by T.J., only in Amsterdam while other man-whores are being murdered in his midst.

name: Benji the Hunted
tagline: Benji is left in the wilderness after an accident - can he survive ?

name: Adaptation.
tagline: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt The Orchid Thief by Susan Orlean for the screen.

name: Empire of the Sun
tagline: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation during World War II.

name: Two Can Play That Game
tagline: An arrogant career woman plays a series of heartless mind-games with her boyfriend to "put him in line," only to discover that he has a few tricks up his own sleeve.

name: The Wizard of Oz
tagline: Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.

name: Emma
tagline: In rural 1800s England things go bad for a young matchmaker after she finds a man for another woman.

name: Hustle & Flow
tagline: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful hip-hop emcee.

name: Don Juan DeMarco
tagline: A psychiatrist must cure a young patient that presents himself as Don Juan, the greatest lover in the world.

name: Nowhere to Run
tagline: Escaped convict Sam Gillen single handedly takes on ruthless developers determined to evict Clydie - a widow with two young children. Nobody knows who Sam is.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 5: The Dream Child
An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
tagline: A family of Emigre mice decide to move out to the west, unaware that they are falling into a trap perpetrated by a smooth talking cat.

name: Darkness
tagline: A teenage girl moves into a remote countryside house with her family, only to discover that their gloomy new home has a horrifying past that threatens to destroy the family.

name: The Medallion
tagline: A Hong Kong detective suffers a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion and is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers.

name: A Soldier's Story
tagline: An African American officer investigates a murder in a racially charged situation in World War II.

name: Cousins
tagline: Two couples go to a mutual friends wedding, and end up swapping partners.

name: Frankenstein
tagline: When Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man he just created, the monster escapes and later swears revenge.

name: Sudden Death
tagline: A disgraced former fireman takes on a group of terrorists holding the Vice President and others hostage during the seventh game of the NHL Stanley Cup finals.

name: Billy Elliot
tagline: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.
